thread.title: BRIEF-Papa Murphy’S Holdings Reports Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.25

title: BRIEF-Papa Murphy’S Holdings Reports Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.25
text: Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Papa Murphy’S Holdings Reports Q4 Pro Forma Earnings Per Share $0.25 Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Papa Murphy’s Holdings Inc: * PAPA MURPHY’S HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $30.7 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY DOMESTIC SYSTEM COMPARABLE STORE SALES DECREASED 2.6% * QTRLY REPORTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.79 * PAPA MURPHY’S SEES 2018 DOMESTIC SYSTEM-WIDE COMP. STORE SALES GROWTH FLAT TO LOW SINGLE DIGITS, INCLUDING LOW SINGLE DIGIT DECLINE IN Q1 * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF AT LEAST $21 MILLION
